title: SYMHC Classics: Walt Whitman, Poet of Democracy
itunes:title: SYMHC Classics: Walt Whitman, Poet of Democracy
description:
This episode is from 2017. Whitman is often touted as the best and most important poet in U.S. history, but he also worked as a teacher and a journalist. And his poetry career didn't start out particularly well.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
